EcmaScript6 Examples - array - find

Method fill from an array in EcmaScript 6 have the function of change the values inside an array for the value informed.

Let's see an example: 

                
                    let arr1 = [1,3,5,10,12];
                    console.log(arr1.fill('z')); //=> ['z', 'z', 'z', 'z', 'z']

                    let arr2 = [2,5,7,9];
                    console.log(arr2.fill('a',2,3)); //=> [2, 5, 'a', 9]

The fill method can change all values or just in a part of array delimited by start and end parameters.
